channel.title: Iam so dumb
channel.description: so ya i got Nerices update or what ever and i logged on a bot i made last night and forgot to put the proxy into the new run-bot know iam freaking out i quickly relogged bak with the proxy iam just not going to use that character anymore so do you guys think iam safe even though my normal ip showed on that bot i had running for only a few hours.

item.title: Iam so dumb
item.dc:creator: @freeza freeza
item.description:
@freeza wrote:

i heard a rumor that if they detect a bot autoing they wait to see if any other accounts login from that same ip then ban them?? to try and get the main account…dam iam so paranoid it really sux lol

oh yeah i have always drop traded to my main with a proxy on my bot and my normal ip on my main

Read full topic

item.title: Iam so dumb
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

I transferred with my reg IP once, nothing happened lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Iam so dumb
item.dc:creator: @freeza freeza
item.description:
@freeza wrote:

thx alot for the info it will setlle my ocd for a few hours lol but really all joking aside thx for the replies and your input

Read full topic

item.title: Iam so dumb
item.dc:creator: @intheknow intheknow
item.description:
@intheknow wrote:

I have friends who usually run 5-6 bots every day and all day without proxies. Thus far their mains are as safe as can be. A mod I know swears that IP bans are very rare.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Iam so dumb
item.dc:creator: @freeza freeza
item.description:
@freeza wrote:

lol well i was running 10 bots last night…but when i logged on the bot i only had one client open when i realized it was my normal ip

Read full topic

item.title: Iam so dumb
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

proxys dont really matter all that much unless your running 3-4 bots or are trading to a mule.
